H0.text: The Zapatista Army of National Liberation (Ejército Zapatista de Liberación Nacional) is a revolutionary group in which country. Mexico

H1.text: The Zapatista Army of National Liberation (Ejército Zapatista de Liberación Nacional) is a revolutionary group in which country. Argentina

H2.text: The Zapatista Army of National Liberation (Ejército Zapatista de Liberación Nacional) is a revolutionary group in which country. Colombia

H3.text: The Zapatista Army of National Liberation (Ejército Zapatista de Liberación Nacional) is a revolutionary group in which country. EUM

A4.text: The Zapatista Army of National Liberation controls territory in Chiapas, the southernmost state of Mexico.

A5.text: The Zapatista Army of National Liberation emerged during the government of the Institutional Revolutionary Party (PRI) in Mexico.
